rdf:Description.dc:title: Measuring up : progress report on the Government of Alberta business plan 2007 progress report on the Government of Alberta business plan.
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta.
rdf:Description.dc:description: The Government of Alberta annual report consists of two parts: Measuring up which reports on the progress that has been made towards achieving the government's goals and Consolidated financial statements published in a separate documents.
rdf:Description.dc:subject: Government productivity
Government spending policy
Waste in government spending
Performance
Benchmarking (Management)
Government publications
